DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find optimal dose Remimazolam Tosilate intravenous general anaesthetic drug operation determine efficacy safety profile compare propofol .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Remimazolam Tosilate Propofol Intravenous General Anaesthesia Operations
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center，double-blinded，parallel control study use Remimazolam propofol anesthesia operations.Subjects randomize different treatment group ( include 3 Remimazolam Tosilate 1 propofol ) anaesthetic pump contimuously bodies.Analgesics muscle relaxant permit operations.Efficacy，safety pharmacokinetic/pharmacodynamic profile Remimazolam Tosilate evaluate .
DOC.criteria: subject age 1860 years； intend nonemergency operations； ASA ( American Society Anesthesiologists ) I II； 18 kg/m² < BMI ( Body Mass Index ) < 30 kg/m² . people contraindication general anaesthesia ; one laboratory finding fall limitation study ( platelet , hemoglobin , aspartate aminotransferase , etc . ) ; history recent use narcotic , analgesic , anaesthetic benzodiazepine hypnotic ; history severe cardiovascular disease ; uncontrolled blood glucose level ; cerebral disease mental disorder ; allergic drug use study ; pregnant woman lactation period .
